cmp: 丰 (buxom/good-looking/appearance and carriage of a person, (surname)/abundant/plentiful/great)
mng: to raise, to lift, to take along (e.g. one's family)

exm.mng: to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials
to hold by the hand, fig. to nurture, to foster, to bring up, to support
